member.name: T:Presentation.Models.Application
member.summary: Represents an application that contains processes and steps.

member.summary: Name of the team responsible for the application.

member.summary: Contact email of the responsible team.

member.summary: Main email address of the application.

member.summary: Collection of processes associated with the application.

member.summary: Collection of steps associated with the application.
